Sentencas: The high sintering temperature (>1500 degrees C) of the electrolyte is the main challenge for the application of proton ceramic electrochemical cells (PCECs).
Titulo: Preparation, characterization and application of BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.2O3-δ for a high-performance and stable proton ceramic electrochemical cell

Sentencas: In this work, we prepare BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.2O3-delta (BZCY) electrolyte materials by various synthetic routes, compare their physicochemical properties and optimize their applications in PCEC.
Titulo: Preparation, characterization and application of BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.2O3-δ for a high-performance and stable proton ceramic electrochemical cell

Sentencas: The BZCYs powder prepared by the solid state reaction method shows a large grain size of 2-3 mu m and is used in the support layer.
Titulo: Preparation, characterization and application of BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.2O3-δ for a high-performance and stable proton ceramic electrochemical cell

Sentencas: The optimal proportion of the support is determined according to the thermal expansion characterization.
Titulo: Preparation, characterization and application of BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.2O3-δ for a high-performance and stable proton ceramic electrochemical cell

Sentencas: The BZCYp powder from the ultrasonic-assisted co-precipitation method presents well dispersed particles of 30 similar to 50 nm and is used as the electrolyte layer and in the fuel electrode layer.
Titulo: Preparation, characterization and application of BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.2O3-δ for a high-performance and stable proton ceramic electrochemical cell

Sentencas: The electrolyte becomes very dense after co-sintering with the support at 1400 degrees C without any sintering aids, giving a low conducting activation energy of 0.26 eV.
Titulo: Preparation, characterization and application of BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.2O3-δ for a high-performance and stable proton ceramic electrochemical cell

Sentencas: The single cell demonstrates excellent performance and good stability.
Titulo: Preparation, characterization and application of BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.2O3-δ for a high-performance and stable proton ceramic electrochemical cell

Sentencas: Under steam electrolysis mode, the cell gives 840 and 260 mAcm(-2) @1.3V
Titulo: Preparation, characterization and application of BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.2O3-δ for a high-performance and stable proton ceramic electrochemical cell

Sentencas: at 600 degrees C and 500 degrees C. Under cell mode, the cell displays 0.46 and 0.21Wcm(-2)@0.7V at 600 degrees C and 500 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Preparation, characterization and application of BaZr0.1Ce0.7Y0.2O3-δ for a high-performance and stable proton ceramic electrochemical cell
